Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Increases the capacity needed to be considered a bottle club
Summary: Increases the capacity needed to be considered a bottle club from twenty persons to one hundred persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to increasing the capacity needed to be considered a bottle club
